resume.bio: I am a designer with over four years of experience doing everything from magazine spreads to vehicle wraps to outdoor billboards. By using new technologies with classic craftsmanship, I work to create designs that excite and engage people. In the workplace I often find myself filling in gaps and thinking on my feet. I have worked full time, part time, remote, and freelance positions, but I prefer the dynamics and creativity of working on a team.
